title: [Large-Scale] Lifelong Education Program for Practicing Engineers via Problem-Centered Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Engineering Mathematics Knowledge and Job-Related Mathematical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening the connection to real-world engineering tasks by utilizing problem cases from actual industrial settings for practicing engineers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of converting real engineering problems into mathematical models
Learners achieve an 80% or higher problem-solving rate for scenario-based problems provided in the LMS
Learners can write reports analyzing the efficiency of problem-solving strategies through peer evaluation
Learners share feedback on problem-solving processes two or more times per week in online discussion forums
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
